section.title: Digital eGift Cards
section.p: Digital eGit Cards are free to setup and sell online. Square users and business owners will only pay the 2.9% + 30 cent proceesing rate when a customer buys a gift card.

section.title: Starter Packs
section.p: Starter Pack gift cards are $40 per pack. The Starter Packs can range from fun to festive to quirky depending on the design needs of Square users ad business owners. Each of the pack contains 20 gift cards and it takes up to one business day to produce them.

section.title: Quick Cards
section.p: Quick Card business cards range from 95 cents USD per card. With Quick Cards, Square users and business owners can add their business name to one of Square predesigned background templates. The Quick Card packs start at 75 gift card per order and take up to three to five business days to produce.

section.title: Custom Cards
section.p: Custom Card business cards range from 80 cents USD per card. With the Custom Cards, Square offers business owners to upload their own art and designs to their gift cards. The Custom Cards packs start at 75 gift cards in an order. They also take up to 15 business days to produce.
